title: Strengthening System Design Practical Competencies: Development Process of Constructivist-Based Mathematics Series Concept Teaching Methods

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of secondary-level mathematics fundamentals and experience with traditional lecture-based teaching methods
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: The learner can explain at least three series concept teaching strategies based on constructivist learning principles
The learner can produce at least two types of visual materials (images/videos) linking series concepts to real-life contexts
The learner can propose strategies to enhance learner engagement through the design of collaborative learning activities applicable in mobile environments
Learners can present a teaching methodology model developed through project-based assessment with peer feedback

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
